techmeme.title: Interviews with 14 Chinese VCs and entrepreneurs show many are setting up Silicon Valley firms only to find that any investment with Chinese ties is a hard sell (Li Yuan/New York Times)
Chinese state media: a Chinese official says the government has invested $6.12B+ in a nationwide project to build computing data centers over the past years (Reuters)
Meta's 2024 Sustainability Report shows its market-based emissions are nearly half of its location-based emissions, highlighting the issue of tracking emissions (Justine Calma/The Verge)
The US says OpenAI and Anthropic agreed to let the US AI Safety Institute have early access to major new AI models to evaluate their capabilities and risks (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Sources: the EU is investigating if Telegram gave inaccurate user numbers to stay under the DSA's 45M threshold; Telegram reported 41M EU users in February 2024 (Financial Times)
